  • Constructor Details

    • HandAdapter

      public HandAdapter(Context context, List<Card> cardList, Map<Card.Rank,Integer> rankDrawables, Map<Card.Suit,Integer> suitColors, HandAdapter.OnCardClickListener onCardClickListener)
      Constructs a new HandAdapter instance.
      Parameters:
      context - The context in which the adapter is running, used for layout inflation and resource access.
      cardList - A list of Card objects to be displayed by the adapter.
      rankDrawables - A map that associates each Rank with its corresponding drawable resource ID for card representation.
      suitColors - A map that associates each Suit with its corresponding color resource ID for card representation.
      onCardClickListener - The listener that will be notified when a card is clicked.

    • onItemClicked

      public void onItemClicked(int position)
      Handles the event when an item in the card list is clicked. This method retrieves the Card at the specified position in the card list and notifies that the item at this position has changed, prompting the adapter to refresh its view.
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the clicked item in the card list.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the specified position is out of range (position invalid input: '<' 0 || position >= cardList.size()).
